description: {"blocks":[{"key":"33ag3","text":"This protocol details the procedure of 6mA labeling and HMW DNA extraction of fresh frozen brain tissue. The protocol is inspired by Fiber-seq.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9avmb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2lsdq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"authors":"Stergachis AB, Debo BM, Haugen E, Churchman LS, Stamatoyannopoulos JA","can_edit":1,"date":"1593129600","doi":"https://doi.org/10.1126/science.aaz1646","guid":"496266C0341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","journal":"Science (New York, N.Y.)","protocol_id":"0","title":"Single-molecule regulatory architectures captured by chromatin fiber sequencing."}}}}

references.title: Single-molecule regulatory architectures captured by chromatin fiber sequencing.
references.authors: Stergachis AB, Debo BM, Haugen E, Churchman LS, Stamatoyannopoulos JA

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9pq3g","text":"Place the Dounce homogenizer and pestles  , chill the centrifuge to   and preheat the ThermoMixer to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":68,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":101,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BC4E1D5013F311ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C623345013F311ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CA5174B013F311ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65dms","text":"Carefully transfer 3-4 (  diameter) tissue punch biopsies (~ ) to the chilled Dounce homogenizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9j40h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1vf2k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"D94B12F013F311ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":201,"value":"2"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"E9D144A013F311ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"50k8","text":"Keep the Dounce homogenizer on ice during the entire disruption process.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnqpi","text":"Add   of the 1X Lysis buffer and let the tissue thaw for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"001E09F013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"056E833013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"klk8","text":"Gently homogenize the tissue 10X with pestle A and 10X with B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pfp9","text":"Push the tissue with the pestle firmly into the bottom of the Dounce chamber with each stroke (Down + Up = 1X).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dourn","text":"Keep the tissue between tip of pestle and the bottom of the Dounce chamber for thorough homogenization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ft7u","text":"Homogenate may become foamy, but this is not a cause for concern.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"albjj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"54u5h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fv022","text":"In the next step, transfer any foam that forms.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"862pj","text":"Incubate   for   before adding   of 1X Wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"34CD214013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3C243FF013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"4145B9F013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6c2fp","text":"Transfer the lysate to a 2 mL Protein LoBind microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89b12","text":"Rinse the pestles and homogenizer with the remaining   1X Wash buffer and add to the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"68F0253013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejbem","text":"Pellet homogenate by centrifuging at   and   for  . Discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"700","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"800E926013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"83A9BA8013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"85ED41E013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61ab5","text":"Resuspend the pellet in   of 1X Hia5 labeling buffer – use a   or wide bore tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"9C903D8013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"A1D0D84013F411ED925F6B96F82F442B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6c5p5","text":"Incubate on a ThermoMixer at   and   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5jcp6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FCED67D0141111EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"900","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"02FFF890141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"06859CE0141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2cd3","text":"Continue with Circulomics CBB Tissue protocol from step 8 onwards.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qmav","text":"Continue with NEB Monarch HMW.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67dck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71oc8","text":"According to ONT protocol Genomic DNA by Ligation (SQK-LSK110) with the following modifications:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ej27","text":"Start with  -  of HMW DNA in 150 uL and sheer 25x with a 26G needle or in Megaruptor to 35kb.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c2l29","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"B0C96970141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"B57F9E80141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"auo8s","text":"Adjust volumes end-prep and FFPE repair step accordingly (i.e. vol x 3), omit control strand (CS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10rn0","text":"Extend ligation step to   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"67lnp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"07FDA170141311EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"09BF75B0141311EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dah09","text":"Extend end-prep and FFPE repair steps from   to   (i.e. 30min at   and 30 min at  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8mdu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"FA1D8980141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"EC3ED120141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E42FFB30141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"20","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E7D1DA10141211EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9pp5a","text":"Elute the AMPure cleanups for   and   after the end-prep and ligation steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"clr0o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"1223E5B0141311EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"154E2390141311EDB8D05949AF79A3F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47mrc","text":"This should yield a ~3x library, aim to load near the high end of the 5-50fmol range, typically ~ .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4gan","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4nc4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"887E5BF0141311ED96584943DC887534","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"uh3e","text":"Note 1:Library prep yield is typically 30-50%.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dkms3","text":"Note 2:The amount loaded can be reduced during subsequent flushes to balance seq yield with # flushes.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
